title: Plan a Mars Rover Traverse
description: A rover planner on Earth needs to plan the next day's drive for a Mars rover to a new scientific target.

tasks.description: Analyze the latest 3D terrain maps from the rover's cameras to identify a safe path to the target.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent plots a path that avoids large rocks, steep slopes, and sand traps.

tasks.description: Create a sequence of drive commands (e.g., 'drive forward 5 meters, turn right 15 degrees').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the full command sequence for the traverse.

tasks.description: Simulate the traverse using a digital twin of the rover to verify the path is safe and the rover will not get stuck.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the simulation and confirms the traverse is safe and will complete successfully.
